titleStmt.title: Historical memoires on the reigns of Queen Elizabeth and King James
titleStmt.author: Osborne, Francis, 1593-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Grismond, and are to be sold by T. Robinson ...,

notesStmt.note: "Traditional memoires on the reign of Queen Elizabeth" has special t.p.
Attributed to Francis Osborne. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
Imperfect: "Traditional memoyres on the raigne of King James" and portraits are lacking on film.
